name: jssm-viz-cli
description: jssm-viz-cli is a command-line interface for jssm-viz, a flowchart vizualizer for fsl finite state machines, using jssm to render FSMs.

scripts.clean: rimraf -f build/ && rimraf -f dist/ && rimraf -f docs/ && mkdir build && mkdir dist && cd dist && mkdir js && cd .. && mkdir docs
scripts.dist: cp build/src/ts/cli.* dist/js/ && cp src/js/jssm-viz.js dist/js/ && cd dist/js && mkdir fonts && cd ../.. && cp ./src/fonts/* ./dist/js/fonts/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run typescript && npm run dist && npm run changelog && npm run docs

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
